channel.title: How do i install JDK properly?
channel.description:
Hey guys , If anyone could please link me or maybe teach me how to install JDK please. I am having trouble compiling and running a server and its really annoying so if someone could please link me to a updated tutorial on how to install JDK.
Thank you.

item.title: How do i install JDK properly?
item.dc:creator: @demps2k9 demps2k9
item.description:
@demps2k9 wrote:

You only do the variables to compile your source.

Read full topic

item.title: How do i install JDK properly?
item.dc:creator: @Owner_Bryan Owner_Bryan
item.description:
@Owner_Bryan wrote:

Nah man, All you do is download install… And if your server doesnt run then right click “run” & “Compile” then click “edit” change it to your version of JDK, If that doesnt work Take a picture of the errors you get and post it on this Topic somone will be abble to help you out! good luck

Read full topic
item.source: How do i install JDK properly?

item.title: How do i install JDK properly?
item.dc:creator: @earnske earnske
item.description:
@earnske wrote:

But don’t you have to go to

Computer>>properties>>Change settings>>Advance tab>> Environment variables.

Then add a new variable named path with the value of the location where JDK was installed?

I don’t know why but i can’t seem to run or compile a server. I’ve read + watched some videos on how to install JDK but there are so many versions out and most of them are old ancient videos.

Read full topic
item.source: How do i install JDK properly?

item.title: How do i install JDK properly?
item.dc:creator: @demps2k9 demps2k9
item.description:
@demps2k9 wrote:

Download it to your desktop, double click it once it has downloaded and it will ask you to install it. Then just remove the one of the desktop after installation.

Read full topic
